summary:
REQUESTED
Character created by SkyrimGTX
Mod created by Poro Plush
descriptionHtml:
-Description

Poro Plush is my alternative nickname.

 I was thinking about a making another follower mod, but was kinda being lazy creating a new character. Then, SkyrimGTX contacted me, saying he wanted me to  create a follower mod out of his character, Hitomi. She looks exceptionally pretty and I was actually looking for a good character to make a follower out of. so here I am with another beautiful follower mod. Hope you guys like it! :D
author: Poro Plush
